reviewtext: I dont know why I bought this tablet, just only one day using it and I stored it in a place where it continues stored... I dont like the screen... it reflects light from many sources (sun, bulbs, etc) despite the type of technology used in the screen...the size is no convenient, I think a bigger one good be better... well, this is my opinion about this product...
summary: Barnes & Noble Nook Simple Touch eBook Reader (Wi-Fi Only)
